values.name: Name
values.only_one_country: Currently, only one country can be selected.
values.category_not_available: Sorry, this category of vehicle is not available yet.
values.function_not_available: Sorry, this function is not available yet.
values.select_time_horizon: A time horizon must be selected first.
values.all_params_set: You have set all the required parameters. Whenever ready, hit the Calculate button.
values.missing_type: It seems that the type of vehicle to analyze is missing.
values.missing_year: It seems that the year for which to conduct the analysis is missing.
values.missing_powertrain: It seems that the powertrain type for which to conduct the analysis is missing.
values.missing_size: It seems that the size class for which to conduct the analysis is missing.
values.missing_country: It seems that the country for which to conduct the analysis is missing.
values.mix_1: It seems that the electricity mix for
values.country_not_found: We have not been able to detect the country to run the analysis for. Please wait a few seconds and try again.
values.job_queued: Your job has been queued. A new notification will provide you with a link to the results page. This may take up to one minute. Do not close this tab.
values.link_to_results: Click on this notification to be redirected to the results page.
values.job_lost: It seems your job has been lost. We suggest you start the calculation again. If the issue persists, please contact us.
values.cookie_disclaimer: We use cookies to support the user-friendliness of our pages. By closing this notice or continuing to explore our pages, you accept the use of cookies.
values.welcome_message_0: Are electric cars really better than diesel cars in terms of CO2 emissions?
values.welcome_message_1: Is it time to consider hydrogen-powered vehicles?
values.welcome_message_2: Will petrol cars improve their emissions and energy efficiency in the future?
values.welcome_message_3: Find it out now with carculator.
values.share_config: The configuration file download will start shortly. You may drag and drop it at your next visit onto the area on the right.
values.inventory_download: The download of the inventory file will start shortly. Requires ecoinvent v.3.6 cutoff.
values.save_results: Your results are saved for one week. To share them, simply copy the url of this page.
values.popup_blocker: Popup-blockers may prevent the result page from being displayed.
values.chart_title_cost: Ownership cost over life cycle, Euro per vehicle-kilometer
values.urban land occupation: Land occupation in an urban environment
values.smr - natural gas: from Steam Methane Reforming of natural gas
values.smr - natural gas with CCS: from SMR of natural gas with carbon capture and storage
values.smr - biogas with CCS: from SMR of biogas with carbon capture and storage
values.wood gasification with CCS: from woody biomass gasification with carbon capture and storage
values.electricity_mix_already_specified: The electricity mix is already specified in the above section
values.powertrain_not_existing: One or several of the powertrains selected may not have been existing for the years selected. Therefore, consider the results with caution.
values.insufficient_width: The layout of this website has not been optimized for the screen width of your device. We suggest to use a device with a larger screen width.
values.country_not_available: Sorry, it seems we do not have the necessary data for the country you are located in. Alternatively, you may try the 'Advanced' mode which lets you adjust geography-related parameters.
values.similar_fuels: One of the fuel mixes has identical primary and secondary fuel types. This is not permitted.
values.missing_vehicles: Your vehicle selection list is empty.
values.clearly_not_1: Clearly not a good idea. Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.clearly_not_2: &#37 higher emissions than replacing it the latest possible.
values.probably_not_1: Probably not a good idea. Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.probably_not_2: &#37 higher emissions than replacing it the latest possible.
values.hard_to_say_1_neg: Hard to say. Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.hard_to_say_2_neg: &#37 lower emissions than replacing it the latest possible. Given uncertainties in our model, the difference is not sufficient to draw a conclusion.
values.hard_to_say_1_pos: Hard to say. Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.hard_to_say_2_pos: &#37 higher emissions than replacing it the latest possible. Given uncertainties in our model, the difference is not sufficient to draw a conclusion.
values.probably_1: Probably a good idea. Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.probably_2: &#37 lower emissions than replacing it the latest possible.
values.clearly_1: Go for it! Replacing your current car early by this model may lead to
values.clearly_2: &#37 lower emissions than replacing it the latest possible.
values.not_a_number: One of the years selected does not seem valid. Remove it to proceed further.
values.not_a_powertrain: One of the powertrains selected does not seem valid. Remove it to proceed further.
values.not_a_size: One of the size classes does not seem valid. Remove it to proceed further.
